hero.title: Let’s talk about your next step.
hero.subtitle: Reach out for course questions, project mentoring, or career planning. Pick the channel that works best for you.

contactMethods.label: WeChat
contactMethods.hint: Add a note like “Course inquiry” or “Project chat.”

contactMethods.label: Xiaohongshu
contactMethods.hint: Find me on Xiaohongshu and DM for course or project questions

tips: When you reach out, include a short intro and your goal so we can help faster.
For 1:1 coaching or mock interviews, feel free to propose a time in your message.
